message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $8,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value our conversation, I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $8,750.  This is a fair price that recognizes the value of the product for both of us. Let's try to make this work!
